name: portofolio-app
description: This was a storage, sales, cash management app built specifically for a petshop business, in this project you can register new products on the storage, make real time sales with immediate updates  on the storage and see your history and total cash earned on daily and monthly sales.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --dev --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
